It was great at the time, but my cassette Walkman had so many
imperfectiÂ­ons. When the incredible iPod arrived, it simply blew it away, as
well as the ghetto blaster! I still have my analog machines but cannot live
without my iPod. He will be mentioned in the same breath as Isaac Newton,
Thomas Edison and Bill Gates. The legend lives on. If nothing else, thank
you for this wonderful music machine, Steve. 56 was much too early for you
to leave us. Your legacy will be immortal. R.I.P.
author: Harry
